scripts.db:switch:sqlite: cp prisma/schema.prisma prisma/schema.backup.prisma && cp prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma prisma/schema.prisma 2>/dev/null || echo 'SQLite schema is default'
scripts.db:switch:postgres: cp prisma/schema.prisma prisma/schema.backup.prisma && cp prisma/schema.postgresql.prisma prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:setup:postgres: npm run db:switch:postgres && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
scripts.db:setup:sqlite: npm run db:switch:sqlite && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
scripts.vercel-build: prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build
